short_summary: Motio Mainttenance for IRCC, A 3-Line Description
description: The Solicitation is for the purchase of a Motio Maintennace and related technical specifications
full_summary:
**Notice of Solicitation**
=========================

**Title:** Motio Maintenance for IRCC Solicitation
-------------------------------

* **Reference Number:** SSC-24-00024917:T
* **Solicitation Number:** BPM020380/24917

**Notice Details**
-----------------

* **Publication Date:** 2024-01-05
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-01-20T00:00:00
* **Tender Status:** Expired

**Solicitation Overview**
-------------------------

This solicitation is for the purchase of Motio Maintenance services and technical specifications for the Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC). The procurement is being conducted by Shared Services Canada, with the purchase order scope focusing on computer software and office automation solutions.

**Key Requirements**
--------------------

* Bid submissions can be accessed through the Shared Services Canada Public Procurement Portal (SSC P2P).
* Interested bidders must register in the SSC P2P portal to view and submit responses to solicitations.

**Contracting Entity**
------------------------

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Shared Services Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, ON K1P 0B6, Canada

**Contact Information**
----------------------

* **Contact Person:** Clara Whittaker
* **Contact Email:** None
* **Contact Phone:** 343-553-8354
* **Contact Fax:** 343-553-8354

**Attachment**
--------------

The solicitation package can be downloaded from [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/28B6C274-0B1A-4B3E-9CFE-CB1D696625BD](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/28B6C274-0B1A-4B3E-9CFE-CB1D696625BD) for English or [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download_public/C232BAEF-6DC7-4796-BF67-FD78F07C07E8](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download_public/C232BAEF-6DC7-4796-BF67-FD78F07C07E8) for French.
